conversations.content: Alice's mouse is broken. Could you rebuy the same mouse I purchased last time? Please apply my available discount and send the invoice to her email at alice.miller@gmail.com.

<|Function_Thought|>
To address the user's request, I need to first retrieve the order history to find the mouse purchased last time. After identifying the correct product, I will then check for any available discounts for the user. Finally, I'll proceed to checkout the product while applying the discount and send the invoice to Alice's email. I will start by viewing the order history to find the previously purchased mouse.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_order_history()]<|/Function_Call|>

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
I have successfully retrieved the order history. The most recent mouse purchased was the "TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse" with the order ID of "ORDER-107495" and the product ID of "P045". Next, I need to check for any available discounts that can be applied to the next purchase.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_available_discounts()]<|/Function_Call|>

Available Discount Codes:
- Code: SPRING10, Percentage: 90.0%

<|Function_Thought|>
I found an available discount code "SPRING10" that offers a 90% discount. Now I can proceed to checkout the "TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse" (product ID: "P045") while applying this discount code. After that, I'll need to retrieve the invoice for the order to send it to Alice at her email.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P045"], discount_code="SPRING10")]<|/Function_Call|>
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
To complete the checkout, I need to verify the shopping account by retrieving the verification one-time password (OTP) sent to the inbox. I'll check for the emails to find the OTP.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_shopping_linked_unread_emails()]<|/Function_Call|>

<|Function_Thought|>
I have retrieved the OTP for the checkout: "698322". Now, I need to verify the shopping account using this OTP to proceed with the checkout for the mouse.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[verify_shopping_account(otp="698322")]<|/Function_Call|>
Account verified. Product ID P045 not found in cart. Cannot proceed to checkout.

<|Function_Thought|>
It seems the checkout was unsuccessful because the product ID "P045" is no longer in the cart after verifying the account. I will need to add the product back to the cart before proceeding to checkout again with the discount code.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_add_product(product_id="P045", quantity=1)]<|/Function_Call|>
Product TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse (Quantity: 1) added to cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
The "TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse" has been successfully added back to the cart. I can now attempt to proceed with the checkout again using the available discount code "SPRING10".
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P045"], discount_code="SPRING10")]<|/Function_Call|>
